701682f-a.text:
Randall Ave. (foreground), at Casanova Street. The view is in a northwesterly direction, showing, in the background, part of the more populated lower Bronx. The two bridges in the distance, cross the tracks of the New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad.
About 1918.
Keystone View Co. Inc. of New York.
701682f-a.folder: Randall Avenue & Casanova Street, Bronx, NY
